subject: JUnit 4 Ant integration
msgSnippet: I ve been testing JUnit 4 with Ant 1.7alpha(from svn). I used both JUnit (not in 3.8 compatible mode) and JUnitReport targets. It works fine. Is this the way
messageBody:
I've been testing JUnit 4 with Ant 1.7alpha(from svn).
I used both JUnit (not in 3.8 compatible mode) and JUnitReport targets.
It works fine.

Is this the way forward for Ant integration?
In this list, I read that you were thinking about separating the JUnit
tasks from Ant.

Regards, Jan
